scripts.build: npm run jsfb:build && npm run paintor:build
scripts.bench: cd dist/js-framework-benchmark/webdriver-ts && npm run bench LANG="en_US.UTF-8"
scripts.jsfb:build: npm run jsfb:install && cd dist/js-framework-benchmark && npm run install-local && npm run install-server
scripts.jsfb:install: rimraf dist && git clone https://github.com/krausest/js-framework-benchmark.git dist/js-framework-benchmark && cd dist/js-framework-benchmark && npm ci
scripts.paintor:build: npm run paintor:copy && cd dist/js-framework-benchmark/frameworks/keyed/paintor && npm install && npm run build-prod
